00240 template<class Archive>
00241 inline void save_construct_data(
00242     Archive & ar, const WntCellCycleOdeSystem * t, const BOOST_PFTO unsigned int file_version)
00243 {
00244     // Save data required to construct instance
00245     const double wnt_level = t->GetWntLevel();
00246     ar & wnt_level;
00247 
00248     const boost::shared_ptr<AbstractCellMutationState> p_mutation_state = t->GetMutationState();
00249     ar & p_mutation_state;
00250 
00251     const std::vector<double> state_variables = t->rGetConstStateVariables();
00252     ar & state_variables;
00253 }
00254 
00258 template<class Archive>
00259 inline void load_construct_data(
00260     Archive & ar, WntCellCycleOdeSystem * t, const unsigned int file_version)
00261 {
00262     // Retrieve data from archive required to construct new instance
00263     double wnt_level;
00264     ar & wnt_level;
00265 
00266     boost::shared_ptr<AbstractCellMutationState> p_mutation_state;
00267     ar & p_mutation_state;
00268 
00269     std::vector<double> state_variables;
00270     ar & state_variables;
00271 
00272     // Invoke inplace constructor to initialise instance
00273     ::new(t)WntCellCycleOdeSystem(wnt_level, p_mutation_state, state_variables);
00274 }
00275 }
